channel.title: For all the idiots woundering like me
channel.description:
When will you guys releas a new moparscape with rune deffender, skill capes, barb assault items etc...
I'm woundering because its getting boring the same items, zammy books getting dull, shields getting boring etc...

item.title: For all the idiots woundering like me
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

thats a simple way of doing it but its not a rune defender

Read full topic

item.title: For all the idiots woundering like me
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You already know that Jagex has changed their cache compression methods, you already know where to get a deobfuscator, you already know about the various problems that could arise, so what makes you think that it doesn’t exist ?

Read full topic
item.source: For all the idiots woundering like me

item.title: For all the idiots woundering like me
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

heres a simple way to make a rune defender, go to your items.java in notepad

search for

public static int shields[] = { (after the { ,type “2997,” with the comma)

it shoudl look like

public static int shields[] = {2997,####,####,####,etc}

then open up your cnfg folder and where it says items open up notepad and drag items onto notepad

once inside items hit ctrl key and f at same time to open up the find menu and search for 2997

replace all the text for 2997 with

item = 2997	Rune_Defender	Rune_Defender	544000	544000	544000	50	50	50	50	50	50	50	50	50	50	50	50

just coppy that

this is my tutorial but not my idea!!!

Read full topic
